TextEng: No, thanks.
Text: 아니, 됐어.

TextEng: I'd like to see what you have in stock.
Text: 뭘 파는지 보고 싶어.

TextEng: What kinds of things do you sell here?
Text: 여기서 어떤 걸 파는지 알려줘.

TextEng: I should go.
Text: 이제 가야겠어.

TextEng: Have you seen any kobolds in the area?
Text: 이 지역에서 코볼트를 본 적 있어?

TextEng: I found this ring outside. Does it belong to you?
Text: 밖에서 이 반지를 발견했는데. 네 거야?

TextEng: Yes, he's recovering... just not completely well yet.
Text: 그래, 회복 중이야... 하지만 아직 완전하지는 않아.

TextEng: No, he's not. In fact, that's why I'm here... I need some herbs for him.
Text: 아니, 아니야. 사실 그래서 여기 온 거야... 그를 위한 약초가 필요해.

TextEng: He wasn't the last time I saw him, no.
Text: 마지막으로 봤을 땐 아니었어.

TextEng: I could not care less. I have other things to worry about.
Text: 관심 없어. 걱정할 다른 게 있어.

TextEng: I need some herbs for Master Drogan: he's been poisoned.
Text: 드로건 스승님을 위한 약초가 필요해: 독에 당하셨어.

TextEng: Tressym tongue, charcoal and helmthorn berries.
Text: 트레심의 혀, 숯, 투구가시 열매.

TextEng: He was alive, last time I checked.
Text: 마지막으로 확인했을 땐 살아 있었어.

TextEng: He was poisoned, but he's recovering nicely now.
Text: 독에 당했지만, 지금은 잘 회복하고 있어.

TextEng: No, he's not. He was poisoned during a kobold attack.
Text: 아니, 아니야. 코볼트 공격 때 독에 당했어.

TextEng: That's actually why I'm here. He's been poisoned.
Text: 사실 그래서 여기 온 거야. 독에 당하셨어.

TextEng: Never mind.
Text: 됐어.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> He needs a bunch of your equipment. Free of charge, I assume?
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 네 장비가 많이 필요해. 무료로 주는 거지?

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> You could donate some coin. The cure is very expensive.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 돈 좀 기부할 수 있어. 치료약이 엄청 비싸거든.

TextEng: No, never mind.
Text: 아니, 됐어.

TextEng: I need some herbs. Tressym tongue, charcoal and helmthorn berries.
Text: 약초가 필요해. 트레심의 혀, 숯, 투구가시 열매.

TextEng: I'll try that, thanks.
Text: 해볼게, 고마워.

TextEng: Mara's actually not at the tavern anymore...
Text: 마라는 사실 더 이상 주점에 없어...

TextEng: I really don't think I'll be asking Mara anything, actually.
Text: 마라한테는 정말 물어보지 않을 것 같은데.

TextEng: I already have some helmthorn berries, thanks.
Text: 투구가시 열매는 이미 있어, 고마워.
